data.persona: My pack is behind me. I am alpha. Now is the wolftime.
data.description:
You are in the Old Queen Farm.
Once a fairly profitable farm, the Old Queen Farm is now a deteriorated old shack surrounded by uninhabitable fields with soil incapable of growing even weeds. The farm house shows signs that is being occupied by wild animals, and the roof is beginning to cave inwards.
The owl and the rat are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a wolf costume.

data.short_motivation: I want to knock the owl down to eat; it is prey
data.mid_motivation: I must eat regularly to keep myself strong and alert
data.long_motivation: I am leading the pack by example and want them to learn from me
